title: The clothiers petition to His Majestie with His Majesties gracious ansvver. To the Kings most Excellent Majestie. The humble petition of the clothiers of Suffolke, and the townes of Dedham and Langham in Essex.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Peter Cole in Cornehill, neare the Royall Exchange,
